MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA1 postcode area of Symington, affecting properties in Tarbolton Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.11am. Our engineers have arrived in Tarbolton road and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58AM on Sunday 18 October 2020.
